crease.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a line on a piece of cloth, paper etc where it has been folded, crushed, or pressed
crease.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She smoothed the creases from her skirt.
I’ll have to iron out the creases.
crease.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the line where the player has to stand to hit the ball in cricket
crease.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to become marked with a line or lines, or to make a line appear on cloth, paper etc by folding or crushing it
crease.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Don’t sit on my newspaper. You’ll crease it!
A worried frown creased her forehead.
